attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention that in several cases, British citizens have been 'politely asked' to remove their Union Flags and the flags of their home nations for fear of offending immigrants, generously given freedom to come to work in this Country.
Since flags can now offend people, it's my concern that the EU flag being present on government buildings, alongside the PM with the Union Flag, and on passports, will offend the vast amount of people in this country who do not approve of the EU or its attack on our sovereignty.
Surely a rule that tries to stop a small minority of people from being offended can apply to a whole nation, of Euro- sceptics.
